title: Honoring Albert Nocciolino upon the occasion of earning his third Tony Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring Albert Nocciolino upon the occasion of
earning his third Tony Award

WHEREAS, It is the sense of  this  Legislative  Body  to  recognize  and
commend individuals who distinguish themselves in their chosen fields of
endeavor,  contributing  to the entertainment and cultural enrichment of
the citizens of the State of New York; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern and fully in accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, it is the intent of this Legislative Body to honor
Binghamton, New York native Albert Nocciolino on earning his third  Tony
Award, Broadway's highest honor; and
  WHEREAS,  Albert  Nocciolino  won the Best Revival of a Musical for La
Cage Aux Folles; he is also responsible for bringing productions to  the
Southern  Tier  along  with  the Broadway Theatre League, and his latest
musical production stars actor Kelsey Grammar; and
  WHEREAS, Deeply committed to  the  cultural  enrichment  of  his  home
community  of  Binghamton, Albert Nocciolino is known locally as the man
who brings Broadway to Binghamton; and
  WHEREAS, As President and Chief Executive Officer of  NAC  Enterprises
Ltd.,  Albert  Nocciolino  brings Broadway Theatre League productions to
The Forum in downtown Binghamton and to other cities around the country;
and
  WHEREAS, Individuals who exemplify  professional  excellence  and  who
contribute  significantly  to the strength, vigor and diversity of their
profession and their community merit the highest  commendation  of  this
Legislative Body; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Albert Nocciolino upon the occasion  of  earning  his  third  Tony
Award; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Albert Nocciolino.
